body:
### What's the deal?
This is the web page for Prince Protect, a game Dan wrote during the summer of 2012!

### Okay, cool what's Prince Protect about?
Prince Protect is an arcade-style, boyfriend-defense, action game where players play as princesses, attempting to keep their harem of princes away from evil ninjas.

### Can I play it with a friend?
Yes! It has two-player co-op with keyboard support. You might want to use [Joy2Key](http://www.electracode.com/4/joy2key/JoyToKey%20English%20Version.htm) to get gamepads going. That's more fun, in my opinion.

### Open source?
Yeah homie. Derive, learn, but do not sell. Better license coming later.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Prince Protect
tagline: A small game prototype by Daniel Savage
